About
Scroll Down to Content
We love to serve all. We want to provide dining experience where you can enjoy with your dear ones. Our goal is to serve food that purify one’s existence and give strength, health, happiness and satisfaction. Food is a gift from God and should be treated with great respect, and that is what we strive to do here at JaxSpice. We love and respect our customers, our employees and our community.
We specialize in North Indian and Nepali Cuisine. Food ranges from vegetarian to exotic dishes layered with texture and flavor. Our team takes great care in the planning and preparation of meals. Chilies, mustard seeds, gram flour, coconut and yogurt are popular ingredients in all types of Indian and Nepali cuisine. Ghee, a type of clarified butter, is used for cooking and has a toasty taste. Saffron is used to flavor and color rice dishes. We prepare foods based on your choice—from mild to spicy to hot. From Masala Chai, Dal, a lentil dish, fish curry, vindaloo, samosas, a spicy turnover stuffed with potatoes and peas, and a puffy rice, yogurt, and tamarind, we offer everything fresh and is prepared by our highly experienced Head Chef and kitchen team members.
Stop by to experience our one-of-a-kind flavors from India and Nepal with your family, friends, co-workers, or significant other!
